alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued September 04 at 3:54AM MDT until September 05 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 3 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 50 MPH with gusts up to 65 MPH likely. Thunderstorms may produce locally stronger wind gusts. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and adjacent Foothills including Interstate 80 between Laramie and Cheyenne, Central Laramie Range and adjacent portions of eastern Platte and Converse Counties including Interstate 25 north of Chugwater. * WHEN...Noon MDT today until 3 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Thunderstorms may produce wind gusts up to 75 MPH across the warned area this afternoon.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Converse County Lower Elevations; East Platte County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
